replies.body:
If you're a S5 skill level player in bronze, it's going to be a slow frustrating grind, but on average you will have a >50% win rate and get there.

Just focus on yourself and play what you're best at. Some games it'll be enough, some it won't, but that's league.

I'm somewhat confused why you grumble about untargetability and then mention being a shaco main, given he has that mechanic with his ult.
